Title: Establishes daylight saving time as the year-round standard time of the state and the city of New York
Summary: Establishes daylight saving time as the year-round standard time of the state and the city of New York.
LawCode: Amd ยง52, Gen Con L; amd ยง2-106, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general construction law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing daylight saving time as the year-round standard time in the state and in the city of New York
